about_the_game:
Ever dreamt of managing a cosmic refueling station? ‘Space Gas Station’ lets you step into the shoes of a fuel station owner in the vastness of space! Restore a forgotten outpost, fuel starships, and turn your humble station into a thriving business.


Restore an abandoned station

This gas station was once abandoned, but now you have a chance to breathe new life into it. Clean the area, repair the equipment and adjust the prices to attract the first customers. A small step for you - a huge leap for your business!

Refuel starships

Every traveler needs a reliable place to fuel up! Welcome ships from across the galaxy, refuel them, and earn credits. Monitor your fuel stocks, adjust prices, and optimize your station to become a key stop for interstellar travelers.

Extract and mix fuel

Why rely on suppliers when you can extract fuel yourself? Explore the planet’s resources, develop fuel deposits, and experiment with creating unique mixtures. Crafting special compositions not only boosts your efficiency but also draws in more customers eager to refuel at your station.

Expand your business

Open new services: a store with rare goods, a workshop for repairing ships and even a cafe for travelers. The more services - the higher the profit! Make your station a place where space travelers have everything they need.

Hire staff and automate processes

Managing a station alone is difficult. Hire employees, train them and assign responsibilities. Implement automatic systems so that refueling, trade and repair work without interruptions. Let your station bring in profit even without your participation!

Can you turn a small outpost into a thriving business? Time to find out! 🚀

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Run Your Own Galactic Fuel Station! Restore an abandoned station, refuel starships, and grow your intergalactic business! Extract fuel, sell rare goods, and repair ships to keep customers happy. Expand your station, automate operations, and become the galaxy's most popular fueling hub!
